text: <@UQNEXHW14> <@U07S0G1730T> is this the right place for support? Thus far it seems like the HubSpot team is not very active in this Slack community. If there is a better way to getting support, please let me know and I’ll go that route. TIA!

Hey David, generally speaking our non-beta channels are only peer-to-peer, meaning you should not expect HubSpotter responses. We generally have more PM engagement in our beta channels, since they exist to gather feedback. I know <@U07S0G1730T> is still hunting down some answers for y'all, so you can expect a reply soon :slightly_smiling_face: Apologies for the delays!
Thanks for the update <@UQNEXHW14>! I totally understand the busyness of building product. Just want to make sure I’m asking in the right place and not treading water. :slightly_smiling_face:
